title: John Carter of Mars: A Princess of Mars (2011) #1
description: Captain John Carter finds himself on a strange new world where he must fight for his very life - and for the heart of a princess! Edgar Rice Burroughs' legendary novels come to life in this actionpacked, all-new re-envisioned adventure! Meet the Tharks, terrible warrior race of Mars! See Woola, the scariest guard dog you'll ever lay eyes upon! Gasp as John Carter battles the great white apes of Barsoom! And hold your breath as he first lays eyes?upon the woman who will change his life forever - the proud?and beautiful Dejah Thoris, Princess of Helium!
